  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.modelio.api.ui.UIColor
    org.modelio.api.ui.UIFont
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.modelio.metamodel.Metamodel
    use IMetamodelService instead.
    org.modelio.vbasic.version.VersionOld
    Use Version without the metamodel version.
  • Deprecated Exceptions 
    Exceptions and Description
    org.modelio.api.model.InvalidTransactionException
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.modelio.metamodel.Metamodel.getJavaInterface(MClass)
    use MClass#getJavaInterface(String)
    org.modelio.metamodel.Metamodel.getMClass(Class<? extends MObject>)
    use MMetamodel.getMClass(String)
    org.modelio.metamodel.Metamodel.getMClass(String)
    use MMetamodel.getMClass(String)
    org.modelio.api.meta.IMetamodelService.getMetaclass(String)
    Since Modelio 3.4 use IMetamodelService.getMetamodel().MMetamodel.getMClass(String)
    org.modelio.api.diagram.IDiagramService.registerDiagramContributor(ContributorCategory, IDiagramWizardContributor)
    use IEditionService#registerContributor
    org.modelio.api.diagram.IDiagramService.unregisterDiagramContributor(ContributorCategory, IDiagramWizardContributor)
    use IEditionService#unregisterContributor
